task: Develop a basic 'Chess' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Emphasize differences'.
name: Duality Chess

branding_data.short_description: Duality Chess is a unique twist on the classic chess game, emphasizing the differences between pieces and strategies.
branding_data.detailed_description: Duality Chess takes the traditional game of chess and introduces a new layer of strategy by emphasizing the differences between the pieces. In this variant, each type of piece has distinct and enhanced abilities, making them more unique and specialized. This alteration requires players to rethink their strategies and consider the unique strengths and weaknesses of each piece more deeply. The game maintains the classic chessboard and objective but encourages players to explore new tactics and adapt to the heightened contrasts between pieces. With its innovative approach, Duality Chess offers a fresh and challenging experience for chess enthusiasts.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
